snippet: The authorities identified the man behind the blast as a 27-year-old who was denied asylum last year....
abstract: Syrian refugee detonates bomb near music festival in Ansbach, Germany, killing himself and wounding 12 people.

byline.contributor: Reporting was contributed by Victor Homola, Patrick Boehler, Gregor Aisch and Rukmini Callimachi.

lead_paragraph: The authorities identified the man behind the blast as a 27-year-old who was denied asylum last year.

headline.main: Syrian Refugee Blows Himself Up at German Music Festival, Wounding 12
headline.print_headline: Blast Kills 1 and Injures 12 Near Festival in Germany

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Middle East and Africa Migrant Crisis
